content:
COMPARED WITH those in wrap-span">Somalia, the wrap-span">pirates wrap-span">prowling the Gulf of Guinea have attracted relatively little global attention. That may now be changing. A recent report by One Earth Future, an NGO, says that the region experienced more incidents of wrap-span">piracy last year than anywhere else in the world. The report adds to a growing wrap-span">chorus of international concern about west Africa’s wrap-span">piracy problem. A wrap-span">shipowners’ association has called for the wrap-span">deployment of international navies to the region. India announced earlier this year that it would ban its citizens from working as wrap-span">sailors in the Gulf of Guinea. wrap-span">Maritime-security experts wrap-span">advise ships travelling to the region to wrap their wrap-span">decks in wrap-span">razor wrap-span">wire or hire local wrap-span">naval wrap-span">escorts.

Their concern is justified. West Africa’s wrap-span">pirates are much wrap-span">deadlier than those in Asia or Latin America. In the latter two regions, most wrap-span">piracy takes the form of wrap-span">petty theft: someone wrap-span">clambers wrap-span">aboard a ship wrap-span">docked at port to wrap-span">swipe a few items or wrap-span">mug a wrap-span">sailor. West African wrap-span">pirates used to specialise in stealing oil from tankers. But since 2014, when oil prices wrap-span">plummeted, they have copied their wrap-span">Somali wrap-span">counterparts and focused on kidnapping crews for wrap-span">ransom. They no longer wrap-span">prey wrap-span">exclusively on oil tankers. Last year they are believed to have wrap-span">kidnapped almost 200 people.

West Africa’s wrap-span">pirates may also be harder to stop than those elsewhere. Off wrap-span">Somalia, where the government controlled little of the country’s wrap-span">territory, international navies were given free wrap-span">rein and wrap-span">shipowners could hire private armed guards. Although wrap-span">pirates still wrap-span">occasionally wrap-span">probe the waters off wrap-span">Somalia for a wrap-span">vulnerable ship, they have largely been kept at bay. In South-East Asia, where the wrap-span">littoral states are wrap-span">richer and better run, governments have curbed wrap-span">piracy by working together and sharing intelligence. Better policing at ports has also led to a fall in wrap-span">petty theft in recent years.

West Africa lies wrap-span">awkwardly in between the two. Most of its wrap-span">pirates are from the poor and wrap-span">lawless wrap-span">Niger wrap-span">Delta region of wrap-span">Nigeria. The wrap-span">Nigerian government is more wrap-span">functional than wrap-span">Somalia’s and would wrap-span">resent foreign ships or private guards in its waters. But it has its hands full with insurgencies, wrap-span">banditry and local conflict on land. Its wrap-span">navy is thinly spread and ill wrap-span">equipped. Until the wrap-span">Delta is better governed, do not expect the wrap-span">pirates to disappear from the seas off west Africa.

他们就这样躺着，直到他抽身出来，感到温热的液体顺着他的腿流下来。 科琳随后也笨拙地从他身上下来。

周遭建筑开始拔地而起，而一边是八车道，一边是六车道的马路却环绕着这些围墙笨拙地弯成弧形。

dock leaves

明年将有一个技术舱与航天站对接。

如果你迟到了，就要扣你的工资。

但是，教师看到在同年龄组中的数百名儿童，他们已装备得很好，以确定他们学生的准备，并提供适当的课程。

A: I think I will call the office to send someone to meet us, and  that person to the nearest hospital without interrupting our trip.
我想我会打电话叫公司派人来接应我们，护送那个人到最近的医院，不至于打乱我们的旅行计划。
We have a counter at the airport. Our representative will escort you to the car.
我们在机场设有柜台， 到时将有代表护送您上车。

ex: adv. 唯一地；专有地；排外地

一个活动图必须被一个活动所拥有，并且必须全面的和专有的描述该活动的语义学；

一个状态机图必须为一个状态机所拥有，并且必须全面的和专有的描述该状态机的语义学。

当我们开口说话,那是完全地专门地为了交流-,没有任何其它动机，除了一件事,也就是俄国形式主义者特别注意的。

eg2: This should load the project in the functional Test Projects view.
这样就在功能测试项目视图中加载了项目。
For example, you can do it after functional test, or you can do it after UAT (user acceptance test).
比如，你可以在功能测试之后做评估，或者在UAT（用户接受测试）后做。
If any of the nodes in the cluster were to fail, a user would be redirected to another functional node in the system, and his or her session would continue as if nothing had happened.
如果集群中的任何节点发生故障，那么用户会被重定向到系统中的另一个功能节点，而他或她的会话会继续，就像什么也没发生一样。

ex: n. 叛乱；暴动；叛乱状态

But the dwindling of the  does not mean that peaceful opportunities abound.
但是暴动的减少并不意味着和平的机会已经大量存在。
If not tackled urgently, the  could stunt the prospects for millions of people for a generation.
如果这一问题不能够迅速解决，叛乱状态将可能延误这一代数百万人的前途。

a mug of coffee

我再也不想看到他那张丑恶的面孔。
They made me look a complete mug.
他们弄得我像个十足的傻瓜。
He's no mug.
他可不傻。

光天化日之下，她在街上遭到抢劫。
to mug for the cameras

ex: adj. 海军的；军舰的

This is what scientists at the naval Research Lab were going for in trying to design a robot that can interact well with a human.
这就是海军研究实验室的科学家们正在努力尝试设计的机器人，这款机器人可以很好的与人类进行互动。
Lapan says the planning is focused mainly on naval and air forces, and that so far no orders have been received to launch any type of military mission in or around Libya.
拉潘说，目前的计划的重点主要是在海军和空军。 到目前为止，军队还没有接到在利比亚境内或周边开展任何形式的军事任务。

支持这个模式意味着维护民主和《宪法》；反对它似乎意味着卑鄙和狭隘。
If you require a building permit, the petty official concerned will obviously get more pleasure from saying «No» than from saying «Yes».
如果你要求一个建筑许可，这个相关的小官员将明显能从说“不”而非“是”获得更多快乐。

一想到又要见到他，她的心情便直往下沉。

猛禽

老年人容易上狡诈推销员的当。

eg2: The company will cooperate with any government probe in the matter as well.
该公司还将全力配合任何政府部门对该事件的调查。
For example, if you wanted to add some code that monitored what method was being called, its parameters, and how an internal computation or algorithm is working, then you can define a custom .
例如，如果你想增加一些代码来监视什么方法被调用，它的参数以及它内部的算法和计算是怎样工作的，那么你就可以自己定制一个探针。
No action was taken, so we feel an independent agency which can conduct the  quickly should be in charge of this case.
但警方没有采取行动，因此我们觉得应该由一个对此案可以立即展开调查的独立部门主管这一案件。
